channel.title: Game Options do not save
channel.description:
The Black Mesa Game Options (view roll, Houndeye tinnitus, etc) always load default values when I quit and come back in. So in effect I need to set them every time I run the game.
EDIT: Upon further investigation it seems that the check boxes are unaffected. Primarily, the view roll always resets to the default which is problematic for people like me who prefer it off.
